titlepage.titleproper: Preliminary Inventory to the Tadeusz Romer Papers, 1913-1975
titlepage.publisher:
Hoover Institution Archives
Stanford University
Stanford, California
titlepage.p: © 1999 Hoover Institution Archives. All rights reserved.

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Tadeusz Romer Papers,
did.abstract: Correspondence, memoranda, speeches and writings, reports, telegrams, minutes of meetings, clippings, and printed matter, relating to political events in Poland, Polish foreign relations, and Polish emigré politics

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Tadeusz Romer Papers, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1977.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

originalsloc.head: Location of Originals
originalsloc.p: Originals in: Public Archives of Canada.

did.unittitle: African colonies - manuscript copies of treaties, notes, 1913-14
Paris Peace Conference - memoranda, correspondence, 1918-19
Polish-French Alliance (1921) - memoranda, notes, treaty draft, 1918-1966
Polish treaties and agreements - memoranda, drafts, correspondence, 1925-1931
Warsaw - memoranda, correspondence, 1922-1935
Rome - memoranda, official correspondence, printed matter, 1929-1935
Japan - memoranda, correspondence, newsclippings, etc., dealing with Japanese Far Eastern activities, 1937-1940
Japan - SUPRA, 1940-41
Shanghai Consulate-General - correspondence, telegrams, 1941-42
Lorenco Marques, 1942
Events leading to war in Europe - memoranda, n.d., 1947
U.S.S.R. - General - minutes of meetings with senior Soviet political figures, messages between Ambassador Romer and the Polish Government-in-Exile (London), 1939-1952
Polish Deportees in the U.S.S.R. - primarily correspondence from Romer to London on the condition of deportees in 1943, 1941-43
High Commissioner in Cairo, 1943-44
Katyn - these papers include correspondence related to the U.S. Congressional investigation into the Katyn massacre (1952), 1943-1952, 1970
General Wladyslaw Sikorski - primarily dealing with Sikorski's Middle East tour during which he was killed, 1943-47
Newsclippings: Sikorski and Romer - primarily from 1943 and dealing with the events surrounding Sikorski's death, 1942-47, 1970, 1974
London - General - reports, correspondence, minutes, 1942-43
U.S.A. - primarily correspondence and reports from Ambassador Jan Ciechanowski on the American political scene, 1943-44

Polish-Soviet border dispute - primarily papers dealing with the boundary dispute dated between the Teheran Conference (December 1943) and the Yalta Conference (February 1945), consisting of reports, memoranda, correspondence, and printed matter, 1942-1952
Talks with Victor Lebedev (Soviet Ambassador to the Allied Governments in London), 1944
The Warsaw Uprising (1 August - 2 October, 1944) - correspondence, memoranda, minutes, 1943-44, 1950, 1954
Negotiations with Stalin and other Soviet leaders, minutes of meetings before and during the Warsaw Uprising, 1944
Polish Armed Forces Abroad, 1941-44

London - General - memoranda, minutes, correspondence, including material related to the Moscow Conference during the Warsaw Uprising, invitations to diplomatic functions, replies to invitations, calling cards, etc., 1943-44
Speeches by T. Romer, primarily from the war period, 1943-1975
Organization and personnel of the Polish Ministry of Foreign Affairs, 1943-44
Germany - Polish-German relations before World War II, Polish interest in Germany during and after the war, 1940-1954
Bulletin of the Polish Ministry of Foreign Affairs, 1943-45
SAME AS REEL #6
Assistance to refugees - memoranda, letters, booklets, 1941-1952
Romer's resignation as Minister of Foreign Affairs (22 November 1944), letters from London's diplomatic corps, 1944
London - General - correspondence, newsclippings, memoranda, maps of Poland, 1944-48
Peace Conferences: Yalta, Potsdam, Paris - newsclippings, 1945-1974
Elections in Poland - memoranda, newsclippings, 1946
Poland after the war - correspondence, 1946-1954
The Hague European Congress - Agenda, correspondence, Romer's speech, reports, resolutions, notes, 1948
U.S. Ambassador Joseph C. Grew - correspondence, booklets, 1940, 1948-1950
Articles on the Polish Question by T. Romer, 1936-1966
Miscellaneous memoranda by T. Romer, 1946-1965
SAME AS REEL #7 (only Volume 5)
